duck: Truncation is the term used for limiting the number of digits right of the decimal point by discarding the least significant ones.
The word Truncation (disambiguation) means "the act of shortening in all senses".
truncation definition: to shorten by or as if by cutting off.

milestones: 5.9 magnitude aftershock strikes Lolol, Chile area
Looted, possibly contaminated body parts transplanted into USA, Canadian patients
